Withering Onslaught.name: Withering Onslaught
Withering Onslaught.flavor: Your deft speed and skill allow you to debilitate your enemy with deadly precision.
Withering Onslaught.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier necrotic and radiant damage.
Withering Onslaught.effect: You can choose to either place your oath of enmity effect on the target (in addition to any other creature that is already on the target of your oath of enmity) or subject the target to one additional shroud (as per your assassinâ€™s shroud power).

Covenant of Assassination.name: Covenant of Assassination
Covenant of Assassination.flavor: You are a master of death, and, with one perfectly timed slice, you end the suffering of any rival.
Covenant of Assassination.onHit: 5[W] + Dexterity modifier necrotic and radiant damage.
Covenant of Assassination.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can choose to have any assassin, avenger, or covenant agent attacks you make deal necrotic and radiant damage instead of their normal damage.

Precision Gait.name: Precision Gait
Precision Gait.flavor: You skillfully stride across terrain, allowing very little to hinder your precise movement.
Precision Gait.effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your speed and enter the prevision gait stance. Until the stance ends, you can shift your speed as a move action.
